sqlMap.select: SELECT ID ,DEVICE_MODEL_ID ,RESOURCE_URI FROM HDP_MO_PROFILE WHERE 1=1 AND DEVICE_MODEL_ID = #deviceModelId# AND RESOURCE_URI = #resourceUri#
SELECT ID ,MODEL_NAME FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL WHERE 1=1 AND MODEL_NAME = #modelName#
SELECT MO_PROFILE_ID ,DM_TYPE ,EXT_RESOURCE_URI FROM HDP_MO_PROFILE_EXT WHERE 1=1 AND MO_PROFILE_ID = #moProfileId#

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri, p.PROFILE_VER AS profileVer, p.NOTI_TYPE AS notiType, p.IS_ERROR AS isError, p.IS_MULTIPLE AS isMultiple, p.IS_DIAGNOSTIC AS isDiagnostic, p.IS_HISTORICAL AS isHistorical, DATE_FORMAT(p.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(p.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime, p.OPERATION AS operation, p.DATA_TYPE AS dataType, p.DESCRIPTION AS description, p.DEFAULT_VALUE AS defaultValue, p.UNIT AS unit, p.DISPLAY_NAME AS displayName, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM HDP_MO_OPTION_DATA WHERE MO_PROFILE_ID = p.ID) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS hasOptionData FROM HDP_MO_PROFILE p INNER JOIN HDP_DEVICE_MODEL m ON p.DEVICE_MODEL_ID = m.ID WHERE 1=1 AND m.OUI = #oui# AND m.MODEL_NAME = #modelName# AND p.PROFILE_VER = (SELECT m2.PROFILE_VER FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL m2 WHERE m2.OUI = #oui# AND m2.MODEL_NAME = #modelName#) ORDER BY p.PROFILE_VER DESC, CAST(SUBSTRING(p.RESOURCE_URI,LOCATE('/',p.RESOURCE_URI)+1) AS SIGNED);

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.RESOURCE_URI AS resourceUri, p.PROFILE_VER AS profileVer, p.NOTI_TYPE AS notiType, DATE_FORMAT(p.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime, DATE_FORMAT(p.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime, p.DATA_TYPE AS dataType, p.DISPLAY_NAME AS displayName FROM HDP_MO_PROFILE p INNER JOIN HDP_DEVICE_MODEL m ON p.DEVICE_MODEL_ID = m.ID WHERE 1=1 AND m.OUI = #oui# AND m.MODEL_NAME = #modelName#
SELECT * FROM HDP_MO_ERROR_CODE e WHERE 1=1 AND e.MO_PROFILE_ID = #moProfileId#
SELECT * FROM HDP_MO_OPTION_DATA o WHERE 1=1 AND o.MO_PROFILE_ID = #moProfileId#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.OUI AS oui ,A.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.DEVICE_TYPE AS deviceType ,A.ICON_URL AS iconUrl ,ifnull(A.DESCRIPTION, '') AS description ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.MODEL_NAME

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.OUI AS oui ,A.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.DEVICE_TYPE AS deviceType ,A.ICON_URL AS iconUrl ,ifnull(A.DESCRIPTION, '') AS description ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DEVICE_TYPE = #deviceType# ORDER BY A.MODEL_NAME

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.DEVICE_MODEL_ID AS deviceModelId ,A.PACKAGE AS package ,A.FIRMWARE_TYPE AS firmwareType ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,M.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,M.OUI AS oui ,M.MODEL_NAME AS modelName FROM HDP_FIRMWARE A INNER JOIN HDP_DEVICE_MODEL M ON A.DEVICE_MODEL_ID = M.ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEVICE_MODEL_ID = #deviceModelId#
AND M.OUI = #oui#
AND M.MODEL_NAME = #modelName#
ORDER BY A.PACKAGE

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.OUI AS oui ,A.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.DEVICE_TYPE AS deviceType ,A.ICON_URL AS iconUrl ,A.DESCRIPTION AS description ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A INNER JOIN HDP_FIRMWARE F ON A.ID = F.DEVICE_MODEL_ID WHERE 1=1 AND F.ID = #firmwareId#

SELECT NC.Id AS id ,NC.MO_PROFILE_ID AS moProfileId ,NC.CONDITION_TYPE AS conditionType ,NC.CONDITION AS 'condition' FROM HDP_MO_NOTI_CONDITION NC INNER JOIN HDP_MO_PROFILE MP ON NC.MO_PROFILE_ID = MP.ID WHERE 1=1 AND NC.MO_PROFILE_ID = #moProfileId#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.OUI AS oui ,A.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.DEVICE_TYPE AS deviceType ,A.ICON_URL AS iconUrl ,A.DESCRIPTION AS description ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ID = #id#

SELECT A.ID AS id ,A.OUI AS oui ,A.MANUFACTURER AS manufacturer ,A.MODEL_NAME AS modelName ,A.DEVICE_TYPE AS deviceType ,A.ICON_URL AS iconUrl ,A.DESCRIPTION AS description ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createTime ,DATE_FORMAT(A.UPDATE_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updateTime FROM HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.OUI = #oui# AND A.MODEL_NAME = #modelName#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE HDP_DEVICE_MODEL A SET DEVICE_COUNT = DEVICE_COUNT + 1 WHERE 1=1 AND A.OUI = #oui# AND A.MODEL_NAME = #modelName#
